levelName: 英文單字認讀成長級(一)

examples.english: My mother's husband works in a big office.
examples.chinese: 我媽媽的丈夫在一間大辦公室工作。

examples.english: He wants to be a loving husband in the future.
examples.chinese: 他希望未來能成為一位有愛的丈夫。

examples.english: They have been husband and wife for ten years.
examples.chinese: 他們已經當了十年的夫妻。

examples.english: Mr. Wang's wife always bakes delicious cookies for their children.
examples.chinese: 王先生的太太總是為他們的孩子烤美味的餅乾。

examples.english: He often buys flowers because he loves his wife very much.
examples.chinese: 他經常買花，因為他非常愛他的妻子。

examples.english: My father and his wife always enjoy walking together in the park.
examples.chinese: 我的爸爸和他的太太總是喜歡一起在公園散步。

examples.english: My aunt became a housewife after her children were born.
examples.chinese: 我的阿姨在孩子出生後就成了家庭主婦。

examples.english: A good housewife manages the home and cares for her family well.
examples.chinese: 一位好的家庭主婦能把家務打理好，並照顧好家人。

examples.english: Being a housewife is not easy; it requires lots of effort every day.
examples.chinese: 當家庭主婦不容易；它每天都需要付出很多努力。

examples.english: Good morning, Miss Lin. How are you today?
examples.chinese: 早安，林小姐。您今天好嗎？

examples.english: Miss Chen is our new English teacher this year.
examples.chinese: 陳小姐是我們今年的新英文老師。

examples.english: Could you please ask Miss Lee to come here?
examples.chinese: 您可以請李小姐過來這裡嗎？

examples.english: My brother will be thirteen next month.
examples.chinese: 我哥哥下個月就十三歲了。

examples.english: We need thirteen chairs for the party.
examples.chinese: 我們派對需要十三張椅子。

examples.english: This book has thirteen interesting chapters.
examples.chinese: 這本書有十三個有趣的章節。

examples.english: The library has fourteen new English books.
examples.chinese: 圖書館有十四本新的英文書。

examples.english: My brother will be fourteen years old next year.
examples.chinese: 我哥哥明年就十四歲了。

examples.english: Please open your textbook to page fourteen.
examples.chinese: 請把課本翻到第十四頁。

examples.english: My sister will be fifteen years old next month.
examples.chinese: 我的妹妹下個月就十五歲了。

examples.english: There are fifteen students in my English class today.
examples.chinese: 今天我的英文課有十五個學生。

examples.english: The train will arrive in fifteen minutes, so hurry up!
examples.chinese: 火車十五分鐘後就會到，所以快點！

examples.english: My sister is sixteen years old this year.
examples.chinese: 我的姐姐今年十六歲。

examples.english: There were sixteen students at the party last night.
examples.chinese: 昨晚派對上有十六位學生。

examples.english: If you are sixteen, you can get a part-time job.
examples.chinese: 如果你十六歲，就可以去打工。

examples.english: My older brother is seventeen years old now.
examples.chinese: 我哥哥現在十七歲了。

examples.english: There are seventeen books on the shelf.
examples.chinese: 書架上有十七本書。

examples.english: We waited for seventeen minutes at the bus stop.
examples.chinese: 我們在公車站等了十七分鐘。

examples.english: My older brother will be eighteen years old next month.
examples.chinese: 我的哥哥下個月就十八歲了。

examples.english: There are eighteen students in our English class.
examples.chinese: 我們班上有十八位學生。

examples.english: The store closes at eighteen o'clock every day.
examples.chinese: 這家商店每天在十八點關門。

examples.english: My dad caught nineteen fish this morning.
examples.chinese: 我爸爸今天早上捕獲了十九條魚。

examples.english: My cousin is nineteen years old now.
examples.chinese: 我表哥/表姊現在十九歲了。

examples.english: Our team scored nineteen points in the game.
examples.chinese: 我們隊伍在那場比賽得了十九分。

examples.english: There are twenty students in our English class.
examples.chinese: 我們英語課有二十個學生。

examples.english: My aunt will be twenty years old next year.
examples.chinese: 我阿姨明年就二十歲了。

examples.english: We need about twenty minutes to walk to the park.
examples.chinese: 我們大約需要二十分鐘才能走到公園。

examples.english: There are thirty students in our class.
examples.chinese: 我們班有三十位學生。

examples.english: The show will start at seven thirty.
examples.chinese: 表演將在七點半開始。

examples.english: It takes about thirty minutes to walk home.
examples.chinese: 走路回家大約需要三十分鐘。

examples.english: My mother will be forty years old next month.
examples.chinese: 我媽媽下個月就四十歲了。

examples.english: We need forty colorful balloons for the party.
examples.chinese: 我們需要四十顆彩色氣球來開派對。

examples.english: The bus ride usually takes forty minutes to get home.
examples.chinese: 搭公車回家通常需要四十分鐘。

examples.english: There are fifty students in my class, and they often play sports together.
examples.chinese: 我的班上有五十位學生，而且他們經常一起運動。

examples.english: My grandma will be fifty next year, and she plans a big party.
examples.chinese: 我奶奶明年就五十歲了，她計畫辦一個大型派對。

examples.english: This book costs fifty NT dollars, so it's quite cheap for students.
examples.chinese: 這本書要五十元新台幣，所以對學生來說相當便宜。

examples.english: The teacher has sixty books for the whole class.
examples.chinese: 老師有六十本書給全班。

examples.english: My grandfather will turn sixty next month.
examples.chinese: 我的祖父下個月就六十歲了。

examples.english: He got sixty points on the math test yesterday.
examples.chinese: 他昨天數學考試得了六十分。

examples.english: I read seventy pages of the book yesterday.
examples.chinese: 我昨天讀了這本書的七十頁。

examples.english: My grandma will be seventy years old next year.
examples.chinese: 我奶奶明年就七十歲了。

examples.english: We need seventy points, and the exam is very difficult.
examples.chinese: 我們需要七十分，而且這次考試很難。

examples.english: Eighty students attended the English club meeting yesterday.
examples.chinese: 八十位學生昨天參加了英文社團會議。

examples.english: My grandmother will be eighty next month.
examples.chinese: 我奶奶下個月就八十歲了。

examples.english: The new computer game costs eighty dollars.
examples.chinese: 這個新的電腦遊戲要價八十元。

examples.english: Our school has ninety classrooms, and they are all new.
examples.chinese: 我們學校有九十間教室，而且它們都是新的。

examples.english: He studied hard and got ninety on his math test.
examples.chinese: 他努力讀書，數學考試得了九十分。

examples.english: The store will open in ninety minutes, so we have to wait.
examples.chinese: 商店將在九十分鐘後開門，所以我們必須等待。

examples.english: There are about one thousand books in the school library.
examples.chinese: 學校圖書館裡大約有一千本書。

examples.english: Thousands of people visit the museum every year.
examples.chinese: 每年有數千人參觀這間博物館。

examples.english: The famous singer sold over a thousand tickets quickly.
examples.chinese: 這位著名歌手很快就賣出了一千多張門票。

examples.english: The number of students in our class is twenty-five.
examples.chinese: 我們班的學生人數是二十五。

examples.english: What is your favorite number between one and ten?
examples.chinese: 你最喜歡一到十之間的哪個數字？

examples.english: What is your phone number? I want to call you.
examples.chinese: 你的電話號碼是什麼？我想打電話給你。

examples.english: I need to finish my English workbook tonight.
examples.chinese: 我今晚需要寫完我的英文作業本。

examples.english: The teacher asked us to open our math workbooks.
examples.chinese: 老師請我們打開數學作業本。

examples.english: This new science workbook has many interesting pictures.
examples.chinese: 這本新的自然作業本有很多有趣的圖片。

examples.english: You should brush your teeth twice a day.
examples.chinese: 你應該一天刷牙兩次。

examples.english: I need a new brush to comb my hair.
examples.chinese: 我需要一把新髮刷來梳頭髮。

examples.english: She quickly brushed the dirt off her new shoes.
examples.chinese: 她很快地把新鞋上的髒污刷掉了。

examples.english: My sister just got a new cellphone for her birthday.
examples.chinese: 我姐姐生日時剛拿到一支新手機。

examples.english: We often use our cellphones to play games or send messages.
examples.chinese: 我們經常使用手機玩遊戲或傳訊息。

examples.english: Students are not allowed to use cellphones during class.
examples.chinese: 學生在課堂上不可以使用手機。

results.meaning: (兒童遊戲用的)踏板車；摩托車

examples.english: My little brother loves to ride his new scooter in the park.
examples.chinese: 我的小弟弟喜歡在公園裡騎他的新踏板車。

examples.english: Many people in Taiwan ride a scooter to go to work.
examples.chinese: 在台灣，很多人騎摩托車去上班。

examples.english: My dad rides a big scooter to take me to school.
examples.chinese: 我爸爸騎一輛大摩托車載我去學校。

examples.english: Let's have a small party at my house this weekend.
examples.chinese: 我們這個週末在我家辦個小派對吧。

examples.english: Everyone danced happily at the Christmas party last night.
examples.chinese: 昨晚大家在聖誕派對上快樂地跳舞。

examples.english: Are you going to the school party next Friday?
examples.chinese: 你下週五會去學校派對嗎？

examples.english: My best friend gave me a special gift for Christmas.
examples.chinese: 我的好朋友送我一份特別的聖誕禮物。

examples.english: He has a natural gift for playing the piano beautifully.
examples.chinese: 他有彈奏優美鋼琴的天賦。

examples.english: We carefully wrapped the gift before the party started.
examples.chinese: 派對開始前，我們仔細地把禮物包好。

examples.english: We will meet at the park at noon.
examples.chinese: 我們中午會在公園見面。

examples.english: It often gets very hot around noon in the summer.
examples.chinese: 夏天中午左右通常會非常熱。

examples.english: Our school gives us a long lunch break at noon.
examples.chinese: 我們學校中午會給我們很長的午休時間。

examples.english: If you drop the glass, it will break into pieces.
examples.chinese: 如果你掉了玻璃杯，它會碎成碎片。

examples.english: He accidentally broke the pencil while writing.
examples.chinese: 他寫字時不小心把鉛筆折斷了。

examples.english: She hopes to break the school's high jump record.
examples.chinese: 她希望能打破學校的跳高紀錄。

examples.english: Your new hairstyle looks pretty on you, Jenny.
examples.chinese: Jenny，你的新髮型在你身上看起來很漂亮。

examples.english: Mom bought a pretty vase to put flowers in our living room.
examples.chinese: 媽媽買了一個漂亮的花瓶放在我們客廳。

examples.english: My little sister drew a pretty picture of a colorful rainbow.
examples.chinese: 我妹妹畫了一幅漂亮的彩色彩虹圖。

examples.english: You will be able to find the library easily.
examples.chinese: 你將能夠輕易地找到圖書館。

examples.english: After studying hard, he was able to pass the test.
examples.chinese: 努力讀書後，他能夠通過考試。

examples.english: My teacher is a very able person and always helps us.
examples.chinese: 我的老師是一個很有能力的人，而且總是幫助我們。

examples.english: My little sister is still very young and loves to play.
examples.chinese: 我的小妹妹還很年輕，而且喜歡玩耍。

examples.english: A young tree needs much water to grow tall.
examples.chinese: 一棵年輕的樹需要很多水才能長高。

examples.english: He is too young to understand such a complex problem.
examples.chinese: 他太年輕了，無法理解這麼複雜的問題。

examples.english: After lunch, I felt full.
examples.chinese: 午餐後，我覺得很飽。

examples.english: The box is full of toys.
examples.chinese: 這個盒子裡裝滿了玩具。

examples.english: The full moon is beautiful tonight.
examples.chinese: 今晚的滿月很漂亮。

examples.english: I feel very lucky to have you as my good friend.
examples.chinese: 我很幸運有你這樣的好朋友。

examples.english: It was lucky that we found the lost puppy quickly.
examples.chinese: 我們很幸運，很快就找到了走失的小狗。

examples.english: You are lucky to have a long holiday next week.
examples.chinese: 你很幸運，下週有一個很長的假期。

examples.english: This movie is so exciting, I want to watch it again!
examples.chinese: 這部電影如此精彩，我好想再看一次！

examples.english: My little sister sings so sweetly, everyone loves her voice.
examples.chinese: 我妹妹唱歌如此甜美，大家都喜歡她的聲音。

examples.english: There was so much rain last night, the streets were flooded this morning.
examples.chinese: 昨晚的雨如此大，今早街道都淹水了。

examples.english: This really exciting game starts at eight o'clock tonight.
examples.chinese: 這個真地很刺激的遊戲今晚八點開始。

examples.english: Did you really see a shooting star last night?
examples.chinese: 你昨晚真的看到流星了嗎？

examples.english: I really want to go hiking with my friends this weekend.
examples.chinese: 我真地很想這個週末和朋友去健行。

examples.english: It often rains during the summer in Taiwan.
examples.chinese: 臺灣的夏天期間常常下雨。

examples.english: Please don't use your phone during the class.
examples.chinese: 請在課堂期間不要使用你的手機。

examples.english: We learned a lot during our trip to Kenting.
examples.chinese: 我們在墾丁旅行期間學到很多東西。

examples.english: My house is near the park, so I often go there.
examples.chinese: 我的家在公園附近，所以我常常去那裡。

examples.english: Please don't stand too near the road.
examples.chinese: 請不要站在離馬路太近的地方。

examples.english: Her birthday is near, so she is very excited.
examples.chinese: 她的生日快到了，所以她很興奮。

examples.english: Can you guess how many candies are in the jar?
examples.chinese: 你能猜猜看罐子裡有多少糖果嗎？

examples.english: I guess we should leave now before it gets dark.
examples.chinese: 我猜我們現在應該走了，免得天黑。

examples.english: Guess what! I got an A on my math test.
examples.chinese: 猜猜看！我的數學考試得了A。

examples.english: Our family eats all meals in the dining room.
examples.chinese: 我們家在飯廳吃所有的餐點。

examples.english: There is a big table and six chairs in the dining room.
examples.chinese: 飯廳裡有一張大桌子和六張椅子。

examples.english: The dining room is next to the kitchen.
examples.chinese: 飯廳在廚房旁邊。

examples.english: Our new apartment has a big balcony where we can relax.
examples.chinese: 我們的新公寓有一個大陽臺，我們可以在那裡放鬆。

examples.english: My mom likes to grow flowers on the sunny balcony.
examples.chinese: 我媽媽喜歡在陽光充足的陽臺上種花。

examples.english: From the hotel balcony, you can see the beautiful ocean.
examples.chinese: 從飯店陽臺，你可以看到美麗的海洋。

examples.english: Koalas live in trees and eat eucalyptus leaves in Australia.
examples.chinese: 無尾熊住在樹上，並在澳洲吃尤加利葉。

examples.english: A baby koala is very cute, and it often rides on its mother's back.
examples.chinese: 小無尾熊很可愛，牠們經常趴在媽媽的背上。

examples.english: We saw a sleeping koala hanging on a tree branch at the zoo yesterday.
examples.chinese: 昨天我們在動物園看到一隻睡著的無尾熊掛在樹枝上。

examples.english: A hippo is a large, powerful animal that lives near rivers.
examples.chinese: 河馬是一種生活在河流附近，體型龐大又強壯的動物。

examples.english: The baby hippo swam playfully in the zoo's big pond.
examples.chinese: 小河馬在動物園的大池塘裡玩耍地游泳。

examples.english: We watched a giant hippo eat grass by the lake's edge.
examples.chinese: 我們看到一隻巨大的河馬在湖邊吃草。

examples.english: A zebra has black and white stripes all over its body.
examples.chinese: 斑馬全身都有黑色和白色的條紋。

examples.english: We saw a zebra eating grass happily at the zoo yesterday.
examples.chinese: 我們昨天在動物園看到一隻斑馬開心地吃草。

examples.english: The baby zebra followed its mother closely across the savanna.
examples.chinese: 小斑馬緊緊跟著媽媽穿越大草原。

examples.english: A kangaroo can jump far with its strong legs.
examples.chinese: 袋鼠可以用牠強壯的腿跳得很遠。

examples.english: The mother kangaroo carries her baby safely in her pouch.
examples.chinese: 袋鼠媽媽把牠的寶寶安全地載在育兒袋裡。

examples.english: Kangaroos are large animals that mostly live in Australia.
examples.chinese: 袋鼠是主要居住在澳洲的大型動物。

examples.english: My mother is a very caring person and always helps others.
examples.chinese: 我的媽媽是一個非常有愛心的人，總是幫助別人。

examples.english: The police are looking for the missing person from the accident.
examples.chinese: 警察正在尋找那場意外中失蹤的人。

examples.english: Every person should try their best to protect our environment.
examples.chinese: 每個人都應該盡力保護我們的環境。

examples.english: Many people like to eat yummy food.
examples.chinese: 許多人喜歡吃美味的食物。

examples.english: The people want peace in the world.
examples.chinese: 人們希望世界和平。

examples.english: Ancient peoples built many amazing temples.
examples.chinese: 古代的人們建造了許多令人驚嘆的廟宇。

examples.english: A kind man helped the old lady across the street.
examples.chinese: 一位好心的男人幫助那位老太太過馬路。

examples.english: Do you know the man who is standing over there?
examples.chinese: 你認識站在那邊的那個男人嗎？

examples.english: The young man hopes to travel around the world someday.
examples.chinese: 那個年輕男人希望有朝一日能環遊世界。

examples.english: My mother is a strong and independent woman.
examples.chinese: 我的媽媽是一位堅強且獨立的女人。

examples.english: The woman behind the counter smiled at me.
examples.chinese: 櫃檯後面的那位女人對我笑了。

examples.english: The woman who lives next door always bakes delicious cookies.
examples.chinese: 住在我家隔壁的那個女人總是烤美味的餅乾。

examples.english: The post office is in the center of the town.
examples.chinese: 郵局在城鎮的中心。

examples.english: Students often go to the learning center after school.
examples.chinese: 學生放學後常去學習中心。

examples.english: He always tries to hit the center of the target.
examples.chinese: 他總是努力射中靶心。

examples.english: We should plan for a better future.
examples.chinese: 我們應該為更好的未來做計畫。

examples.english: What do you want to be in the future?
examples.chinese: 你未來想成為什麼？

examples.english: She hopes to have a bright future.
examples.chinese: 她希望擁有光明的未來。

examples.english: At what age do children usually start school?
examples.chinese: 小孩通常幾歲開始上學？

examples.english: We are now living in the digital age.
examples.chinese: 我們現在正生活在數位時代。

examples.english: He began to age after working for many years.
examples.chinese: 工作多年後，他開始變老了。

examples.english: The class will start in five minutes.
examples.chinese: 課程將在五分鐘後開始。

examples.english: Please give me a minute to think about it.
examples.chinese: 請給我一分鐘時間思考一下。

examples.english: Every minute counts when you have a test.
examples.chinese: 當你考試時，每一分鐘都很重要。

examples.english: Christmas is a happy holiday on December 25th.
examples.chinese: 聖誕節是一個在十二月二十五日的快樂節日。

examples.english: I love Christmas, so I always help decorate the tree.
examples.chinese: 我喜歡聖誕節，所以我總是幫忙裝飾聖誕樹。

examples.english: My family always celebrates Christmas together and exchanges gifts.
examples.chinese: 我的家人總是一起慶祝聖誕節並交換禮物。

examples.english: My cat has a small bell on its collar.
examples.chinese: 我的貓項圈上有一個小鈴鐺。

examples.english: The school bell rings loudly when class is over.
examples.chinese: 下課時，學校的鐘響得很響亮。

examples.english: I heard the doorbell ring just now.
examples.chinese: 我剛剛聽到門鈴響了。

examples.english: We saw a big turkey walking slowly on the farm.
examples.chinese: 我們看到一隻大火雞在農場裡慢慢地走著。

examples.english: My family loves to eat roasted turkey on Thanksgiving.
examples.chinese: 我的家人很喜歡在感恩節吃烤火雞。

examples.english: Do you know that turkeys can also fly short distances?
examples.chinese: 你知道火雞也能飛短距離嗎？

examples.english: I saw a strange thing in the park yesterday.
examples.chinese: 我昨天在公園裡看到一個奇怪的東西。

examples.english: The most important thing is to be kind to others.
examples.chinese: 最重要的事情是要對別人友善。

examples.english: Can you pass me that red thing on the table?
examples.chinese: 你能把桌上那個紅色的東西遞給我嗎？

examples.english: My teacher wears glasses to help her read books clearly.
examples.chinese: 我的老師戴眼鏡來幫助她清楚地閱讀書籍。

examples.english: Oh no! I left my glasses at home today.
examples.chinese: 糟了！我今天把眼鏡忘在家裡了。

examples.english: He bought new sunglasses for his summer trip.
examples.chinese: 他買了新太陽眼鏡去他的夏日旅行。

examples.english: He always wears a leather belt with his school uniform.
examples.chinese: 他總是穿校服時繫皮帶。

examples.english: Please tighten your belt so your pants don't fall down.
examples.chinese: 請把你的皮帶繫緊，這樣你的褲子才不會掉下來。

examples.english: My favorite belt is black, but it's a little old now.
examples.chinese: 我最喜歡的皮帶是黑色的，但它現在有點舊了。

examples.english: I think learning English is very important for us.
examples.chinese: 我認為學英文對我們來說很重要。

examples.english: What are you thinking about? You look so serious.
examples.chinese: 你在想什麼？你看起來很嚴肅。

examples.english: My brother often thinks about his favorite video game.
examples.chinese: 我哥哥常常在想他最喜歡的電玩遊戲。

examples.english: The library is always quiet, so I can study well.
examples.chinese: 圖書館總是安靜的，所以我可以好好學習。

examples.english: The students became quiet when the bell rang.
examples.chinese: 當鐘聲響起時，學生們都安靜下來了。

examples.english: My little brother is very quiet and loves to read books.
examples.chinese: 我的小弟弟很安靜，他喜歡看書。

examples.english: Science class is always interesting when our teacher tells stories.
examples.chinese: 當我們的老師講故事時，科學課總是很有趣。

examples.english: Going to the night market is always an interesting experience for me.
examples.chinese: 對我來說，去夜市總是一種有趣的體驗。

examples.english: It is interesting to learn about different countries and their cultures.
examples.chinese: 了解不同的國家和他們的文化是很有趣的。

examples.english: My favorite animal is a cat because it is so soft.
examples.chinese: 我的最愛動物是貓，因為牠很柔軟。

examples.english: She picked the blue one as her favorite.
examples.chinese: 她選擇藍色的那一個作為她最喜愛的。

examples.english: Playing basketball is my favorite sport to play.
examples.chinese: 打籃球是我最喜愛的運動。

examples.english: Do you have any brothers or sisters?
examples.chinese: 你有任何兄弟姐妹嗎？

examples.english: I don't have any money right now.
examples.chinese: 我現在沒有任何錢。

examples.english: You can take any bus to the museum.
examples.chinese: 你可以搭乘任何一班公車去博物館。

examples.english: I often wait for my friend after school.
examples.chinese: 我放學後常常等我的朋友。

examples.english: Please wait here until I come back.
examples.chinese: 請在這裡等我回來。

examples.english: We had to wait a long time for the train yesterday.
examples.chinese: 我們昨天等了很久的火車。

examples.english: Don't worry, your test results will be good.
examples.chinese: 別擔心，你的考試成績會很好的。

examples.english: My mom often worries about my health.
examples.chinese: 我媽媽經常擔心我的健康。

examples.english: Losing my phone was a big worry for me.
examples.chinese: 弄丟我的手機對我來說是個很大的煩惱。

examples.english: My brother got a new toy for his birthday.
examples.chinese: 我的弟弟生日時拿到一個新玩具。

examples.english: You should study hard to get good grades.
examples.chinese: 你應該努力學習才能取得好成績。

examples.english: Can you please get me a glass of water?
examples.chinese: 你可以幫我拿一杯水嗎？

examples.english: Please share your snacks with your friends during recess.
examples.chinese: 請在下課時間和你的朋友分享你的點心。

examples.english: We should share our ideas about the project in class tomorrow.
examples.chinese: 我們明天應該在課堂上分享我們對這個專案的想法。

examples.english: My grandmother loves to share her old stories with our family.
examples.chinese: 我奶奶喜歡和我們家人分享她以前的故事。

examples.english: The boy likes to kick the ball with his new shoes.
examples.chinese: 那個男孩喜歡用他的新鞋踢球。

examples.english: The soccer player tried to kick the ball into the goal.
examples.chinese: 那個足球員試圖把球踢進球門。

examples.english: My sister usually kicks off her shoes when she gets home.
examples.chinese: 我姊姊通常在回家時會踢掉她的鞋子。

examples.english: Can you remember your new teacher's name?
examples.chinese: 你記得你們新老師的名字嗎？

examples.english: Please remember to turn off the lights before you leave.
examples.chinese: 離開前請記得關燈。

examples.english: She can still remember her first day at school.
examples.chinese: 她仍然記得她上學的第一天。

examples.english: The two boys started to fight on the playground.
examples.chinese: 那兩個男孩在操場上開始打架。

examples.english: My brother and I often fight over little things.
examples.chinese: 我哥哥和我經常為小事吵架。

examples.english: We must fight for what we believe is right.
examples.chinese: 我們必須為我們認為正確的事情而奮鬥。

examples.english: The girl likes to shout when she feels excited.
examples.chinese: 這女孩在興奮時喜歡喊叫。

examples.english: Please don't shout at your brother in the house.
examples.chinese: 請不要在家裡對你弟弟大聲喊叫。

examples.english: He had to shout for help after he fell down.
examples.chinese: 他跌倒後不得不大聲呼救。

examples.english: The boy hid behind the big tree.
examples.chinese: 男孩躲在大樹後面。

examples.english: We must work hard so we don't fall behind.
examples.chinese: 我們必須努力工作才不會落後。

examples.english: Don't leave your bag behind when you go.
examples.chinese: 你走的時候不要把包包忘記帶走。

examples.english: They sat in the front row during the movie.
examples.chinese: 他們看電影時坐在前排。

examples.english: The bus driver sits at the front of the bus.
examples.chinese: 公車司機坐在公車前面。

examples.english: There is a big tree in front of our house.
examples.chinese: 我們家前面有一棵大樹。

examples.english: The cat is sleeping between the two pillows.
examples.chinese: 貓咪睡在兩個枕頭之間。

examples.english: My English class is between 8:00 AM and 9:00 AM.
examples.chinese: 我的英文課在上午八點到上午九點之間。

examples.english: You must choose between the red one and the blue one.
examples.chinese: 你必須在紅色和藍色之間做選擇。
